description: Main application component for a responsive website with a carousel showing various computer services, theme toggling, and image handling.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Root component rendering site branding, theme toggle, and carousel with slides.

methods.name: tryResolveImage
methods.description: Function to dynamically require and resolve an image asset, with fallback if not found.

methods.name: usePrefersReducedMotion
methods.description: Custom hook to detect user's preference for reduced motion for accessibility.
